segments.text: Oh Gush ! The first day of my career is over . I can not breathe now after dealing with so many documents . But I heard the notice that our company will hold two-week staff training .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Stop fussing ! It is said that the training is important for our newcomers . And my company also informs me to attend the training next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But for me , the training is waste of my precious time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I disagree with you . Companies usually make a workable and reasonable plan for the trainings , so as to improve new comers ' understanding of the company and its rules in short time . Through the training , we get to know many things , such as the corporate culture and spirit . Our newcomers can really grasp the essence of the company
segments.speaker: S2
